Description: Glass coin-weight of al-Hakim, made in Egypt, dated 403 AH (AD 1012–13). (whole)
Arabic inscription within a dotted circle. (reverse)
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2015-2016 29 Oct–7 Feb, London, BM, G35, Egypt: faith after the pharaohs.
Acquisition name: Donated by: Rev Greville John Chester
